g.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"

text.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"
text.tspan: Undercards is a Strategy/Card Game based on
UNDERTALE, and takes a lot of inspiration from Magic
the Gathering and Runescape. The game is web-based,
and is simple enough that almost anyone can get into
it, but has enough depth that it can keep you intrugied
for hours on end. Undercards recieves two updates a
month, bringing in changes to/new cards constantly,
so there's always new strategies to try out!
